name: btv-meetup
description: Discover events, RSVP, and collaborate with Burlington's AI-in-software community — from Claude.
long_description: Connect Claude to the BTV Meetup community for people interested in using AI in software development. Browse upcoming events, RSVP with a single command, check in on the day of, submit and vote on meetup ideas, and more. Organizers can also create and manage events directly through Claude.

tools.name: get_event_details
tools.description: Get details and capacity snapshot for one event

tools.name: rsvp_to_event
tools.description: RSVP the current user to an event

tools.name: cancel_my_rsvp
tools.description: Cancel one of the current user's RSVPs

tools.name: my_upcoming_rsvps
tools.description: List the current user's active upcoming RSVPs

tools.name: submit_meetup_idea
tools.description: Submit a new meetup idea for organizers

tools.name: vote_on_idea
tools.description: Upvote or downvote a meetup idea

tools.name: export_event_to_calendar
tools.description: Export an event as an ICS calendar file

tools.name: check_in_to_event
tools.description: Check in to an event on the day of

tools.name: view_attendee_list
tools.description: Get full attendee list with emails (organizer/admin only)

api_url.title: BTV Meetup API URL
api_url.description: The URL of your BTV Meetup server (e.g. https://btv-meetup.example.com/api/mcp)

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Your personal MCP token from Settings → Integrations
